content: When there was despair in the dust bowl and depression across the land, she saw a nation conquer fear itself with a New Deal, new jobs, a new sense of common purpose. Yes, we can.
translations: ita:Quando c'era disperazione nella piana polverosa e depressione attraverso la terra, vide una nazione conquistare la paura
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
